ComicInfo.Title: Take a Tip from ProJunior, fellas:; The Good Deed; Pro Junior's Little Difficulty; Pro Junior Comix; Personal Turmoil; Look Out Sinner! Here Comes... ProJunior; Pro Junior and the Junior Prom; Juan Cristobal Valdez de ProJunior ...Explorer; The Jazz Slinger; Pro Junior and Belinda Berkeley Pull Dat Ole Switcheroo; Jim Mitchell's Pro Junior Comix; Pro Junior Learns to Draw!; Pro-Junior Tries Yoga; Bongo Bongo Bongo; Perdido Part Two; Perdido Part One
ComicInfo.Summary:
A parody of comics warning against sexually-transmitted diseases.
Pro Junior finds a half-full bottle of high-powered liquor.
Pro Junior goes to see Mr. Toad about a sexual problem, but finds that Mr. Toad is no help.
Pro Junior misbehaves at the dinner table. When his parents complain, he turns into an angel and flies away.
When the government suspends civil liberties; Pro Junior becomes a leftist terrorist.
Pro Junior, clad in his leopard skin, gets caught up in the rush to get off a subway car.
Instead of a diploma, Pro Junior gets a one-way ticket to Vietnam, then gets kidnapped by a motorcycle gang.
Pro Junior and his friend get turned away at the adult book store because they're not 21 years-old.
Pro Junior, clad in the leopard skin, goes on a crusade against prostitution, but there's a catch.
The two girls Pro Junior wants to ask to the prom are already taken.
Pro Junior wants to ask Monica to the prom, but takes so long to get to the point that he ends up asking someone else.
A parody with Pro Junior as a Spanish explorer reporting back to the King and Queen.
Pro Junior gets some revenge on pigeons that harass him while he's pan-handling.
A surreal chase with both Pro Junior and the police turning into strange flying beings.
Pro Junior tries to escape a gang by sliding down an alley and falling in an open manhole.
Pro Junior and Belinda change their appearance to get people to treat them differently.
Pro Junior calls at a communal house to pick up his computer-matched date.
Pro Junior takes a drawing course to learn how draw cartoons.
Pro Junior tries yoga but his body doesn't like it.
Pro Junior wonders "What is reality?" And gets himself in trouble with his girl friend.
Pro Junior drives his hot rod to go on a date with Lu Ann, but three hoods have moved the roadblock where a bridge is out.
Harmon slugs Pro Junior after he makes fun of Harmon's severe acne.
